articles.title: Solar flare erupts on Sun, detects NASA; blackouts over Australia, Solar storm likely - HT Tech
articles.description: A solar flare erupted on the Sun and sparked radio blackouts over the region of Australia and New Zealand. It also raised fears of a solar storm. NASA’s Solar Dynamics Observatory has taken images of this chaotic event.
articles.content: Despite multiple close calls, we have been quite lucky when it comes to solar storms. Even as multiple solar flares have erupted over the last 10 days, only one released a coronal mass ejection (CME)… [+2413 chars]

articles.title: The Dark Side of Weight Loss Drugs: Startling New Risks Revealed - SciTechDaily
articles.description: They’re being hailed as an effective way to lose weight, but diabetes drugs like Ozempic may come with a heightened risk of severe gastrointestinal problems. That’s according to new research from the University of British Columbia showing that medications kno…
articles.content: Recent research from the University of British Columbia has found that GLP-1 agonists, a type of diabetes medication used off-label for weight loss, carry heightened risks of severe gastrointestinal … [+5466 chars]

articles.description: New research, supported by advanced dating techniques, suggests that humans settled in the Americas around 23,000 years ago, challenging earlier beliefs of a 14,000-year timeline. When and how humans first settled in the Americas is a subject of considerable …

articles.title: Chandrayaan-4 mission in spotlight after ISRO logs massive success with Chandrayaan-3 mission - HT Tech
articles.description: Chandrayaan-4 mission has grabbed the spotlight as ISRO winds down the Chandrayaan-3 mission again. ISRO is preparing for the LUPEX mission in collaboration with JAXA.
